## `EnableVerboseLogging`

Toggles whether verbose\index{log report!settings} logging is enabled.

### Syntax {-}

``` {.lua}
EnableVerboseLogging(boolean enable)
```

### Parameters {-}

**Parameter** | **Description**
| :-- | :-- |
| `boolean` enable | `true` to use verbose logging. |
